Functions
01602_System_TA_Anti_Downgrade_Fuse
Runtime

Functions

 TestCase_GC00000_dummy_first_test_case ()

Detailed Description

Description:
: Note: for each test TA UUID will be different... before first test case, device should be reflash? Check in setup function on first_test_case that efs does not exists. Only first test case is working on all kinibi version (after it's for Kinibi>=400) The name code for the test trustlet is as follow : 0351084012350456(SYS=00|SP=01)(DIFF_UUID=xx)0000000(TEST_CASE=xxxxx)v(VERSION_MAJOR)-(VERSION_MINOR)-(RP_ACTIVATED=0|1)(CODE_UPDATED=0|1)(WRONG_SIGN=0|1)

TestCase_GC00100_Single_Downgrade ( )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
03510840123504560000000000000103v0-0-100 03510840123504560000000000000103v1-0-100 07010000000000000000000000000000
Focus:
Check that downgrading a protected system TA succeeds when the Rollback Protection fuse is disabled
Test Steps:
Open a session on a system TA with version set to 1 and check it succeeds. Open a session on a system TA with version set to 0 and check it succeeds.
